name: It's just a game about balls
name_original: It's just a game about balls
description:
Hey!

This is the first GameMaker game I've released. It's pretty simple; instructions are in the game. Make sure you keep all those bars up - it's really important that you keep them up or the game's over.

It's only on Windows, which I know is rubbish, but I don't have export modules for other OSes. Maybe in the future!

Everything by Tim Skew
